extendedInfo.description: Unlock Pro features for Out of Milk, the most intuitive and easy-to-use Shopping List, To-Do List and Pantry List app for Android.The Out of Milk Unlocker makes all of the Pro features of Out of Milk available to you. This is NOT the Out of Milk program. In order for this program to work, you must have the latest version (v2.0.9 and up) of Out of Milk installed on your phone.  This is a very small application that will install onto your phone. It will NOT show up in your app drawer, it is only a license. After installing this unlocker, launch the normal Out of Milk application and enjoy our great Pro features.Out of Milk Download: https://market.android.com/details?id=com.capigami.outofmilk-- Pro Features --â Pick from different themesâ Pick from different fontsâ Customize tap and long-press actionsâ Widgets - Add list widgets to your homescreensâ Coupons - Keep track of coupons in your shopping listsâ More coming soon!-- Standard Features --Along with all these Pro features, Out of Milk ships out of the box (for free) with the following features:* Multiple Shopping & To-Do Lists* Share lists in real-time with friends and family* Scan or manually enter items in your Shopping Lists* Plan grocery list* Shopping List History remembers items* Pantry Lists let you inventory anything so you always know what's in your pantry* Send lists by text or email* Move or copy items between Shopping List and Pantry Lists* Displays grand total and running total on your Shopping List* View price history while editing a Shopping List item* Mark items in your Shopping List as tax-free. Out of Milk will also remember your choice for future reference

reviews.title: Incredibly useful
reviews.comment: I love the fact that I can create several different lists, keep track of what I already have, and keep track of prices. Scanning bar codes and keeping track of everything is fast and easy. I managed to check off everything in my kitchen in about 15 minutes. I am a bachelor without a ton of food but it was really simple. Now when I shop based on recipes I have, I will know what I have and what I need.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!!
reviews.comment: I love this app!!!!  It\'s great.  It\'s simple to use & keeps you so organized.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I have tried several other apps out there, n this one is the best. Easy to use, can customize it to my liking for the most part, and is just simple. Thank you!!
reviews.author: Kam Bentley

reviews.title: Great, Could Use a Few Things
reviews.comment: It\'s a great app, no question - but there are things that would make it even better. 1. Allow users to disable the screen from sleeping while in the app. 2. Move items that are in the cart to the bottom of the entire list, not just to the bottom of the category. 3. Give it automatic backup (weekly would be nice) or at least a reminder to do it each week.
reviews.author: Shanna K

reviews.title: Nice app accept...
reviews.comment: Great app but it doesn\'t give me deals at my local Kroger (46902], which is the closest grocery store to me. Please fix!
reviews.author: Michelle Akins

reviews.title: Swarocks
reviews.comment: Invaluable! Love creating new lists for things I don\'t want to forget. Places to go, movies to see, books to read, songs to add to iTunes! Anything I need to remember! Trust me, once you have it, you\'ll never want to be without it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great but..
reviews.comment: I love the out of milk app and like that I can change the theme and font, however it won\'t let me use the widget. It no longer even shows in my widget list :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This app is so easy to use.  Great for weekly shopping and I\'m able to keep a running list handy of my child\'s wish list for Christmas all year!!!
reviews.author: Tania Owen

reviews.title: Love It!
reviews.comment: Very useful application. No issues. Easy to use and good interface. Samsung Galaxy SIII
reviews.author: Michelle S

reviews.title: Fix the widget
reviews.comment: Can u pls make widget change style/color as well? I really dislike the notepad theme and if i knew it would be like this i would\'ve never purchased the app. Also, it is imposible to edit on the widget itself. It has to open the app which defeats the purpose. Otherwise fairly nice. If u dont fix the widget i will ask for my money back.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Out of milk
reviews.comment: I love that my grocery list can include items from all the featured stores and I don\'t have to pick a primary store.  Along with the regular grocery stores such as Albertson\'s, Safeway, etc., this app also includes Trader Joe\'s, Costco and Cash and Carry.  I like that I can check that I have a coupon for a particular item.    Wow! The new H-Mart opened and now the sales are on this app....absolutely awesome!
reviews.author: Sue Jones

reviews.title: Excellent App - use it daily
reviews.comment: This app is amazing. I ended up buying the pro just to support the company because the app is so good. I literally use it everyday. It has saved me from having to go back to the store for things I would@ have forgotten. And now with the grocery stores listed it\'s even better than before.
reviews.author: Laura Starr

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Love this app, helps me stay organized. I am however a big couponer and would like to see the option to add multiple coupons for each item as well as specify the type of coupons (manufacturer, specific stores, etc) :)
reviews.author: Angelica Zaldivar

reviews.title: Bravo
reviews.comment: Can I just say that this is the most used app on my phone, taking second to Facebook.  And that was before the update! I updated this morning to see the new deals button and was compelled to leave an excellent rating. Kudos to the team and the testers. I appreciate you!
reviews.author: Irene Hill

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I fell completely in love with this app after I scanned my entire spice cabinet! The only problem I have is that I wish I could search my pantry for items already in there, It would be an easy five stars with the search.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best App for me
reviews.comment: I absolutely love this App!  And with the new Grocery Deals update it just keeps getting better.  Scanning the pantry is a breeze.  I\'ve told all the girls I work with that you can\'t go wrong with Pro.   I will honestly say that if I lose my phone, Out of Milk will be what I would miss the most :)
reviews.author: Sherol Bose

reviews.title: Widget needs flick-based scroll
reviews.comment: The widget needs to be able to scroll through the list just by fkicking. I can flick through GMail without having to open it, it would be nice if I could do it for a list too so I don\'t accidentally miss the scroll buttons and open the app. (Using it on 4.1.) Theming the colors would be nice too, but isn\'t as critical.   Great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
reviews.comment: One of my fav apps! So useful, time saving, convenient! One of those apps you will use all the time. A must have!
reviews.author: Monique A

reviews.title: Great for TO DO Lists in addition to Grocery Lists
reviews.comment: This is the number one app I use on a daily basis to stay organized. Great features in the Pro Edition Unlock. I love the customizable categories and all the helpful features!!!!!
reviews.author: Shannon Villemez

reviews.title: Ads
reviews.comment: What\'s with the banner ads that have started popping up on screen? That\'s not why I paid for this.
reviews.author: Glenn Morse
